name: 3C8
description:
Prepare to experience tic tac toe in a way like never before, this fun, challenging, and innovative game will have you playing nonstop!

Challenge opponents to an exciting game of chance and wit!

Take your chances on a roll to get an advantageous position or move to block your opponent from getting a winning combination! Make the best decision and claim your victory!

Place 3 tokens in a row and you get to capture one of your opponent's tokens! Capture all but 2 of their tokens and you win! Be careful not to get captured yourself though!

Play online against friends or other players no matter what device they have, cross platform play is supported!

Be the fastest! Keep an eye on your timer, don't let it fall to 0 or your opponent will win!

Test your skills against our artificial intelligence!

Communicate with your opponent through our new chat system and then get a rematch!
